title: Roval’s new Control Carbon wheelset offers SL performance at half the cost
content:
If you had been saving for a set of the Roval Control SL Team Issue wheels since the release last year – hold on – we have some news for you. The New Roval Control Carbon wheelset looks to channel the performance and technology of the Flagship $2500 Control SL package in a much more […]

The post Roval’s new Control Carbon wheelset offers SL performance at half the cost appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
